general.name: mangaFrame
general.short: extracted fiber spectra for each camera for the science exposures
general.description: The mgFrame files are the extracted fiber spectra for each camera for the science exposures.

surveys.name: MaNGA
surveys.long: Mapping Nearby Galaxies at Apache Point Observatory
surveys.description: A wide-field optical spectroscopic IFU survey of extragalactic sources to study galaxy dynamics and kinematics

general.naming_convention: mgFrame-[camera]-[exposure].fits.gz, where [camera] is one of the four cameras on the instrument, b1, r1, or b2, r2, for the blue and red cameras on each SDSS spectrograph. [exposure] is the (zero-padded) 8-digit exposure number.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

dustb: PT outside dust density, 1.0 micron

hdu2.name: IVAR
hdu2.description: Inverse variance (1/sigma2) for the above [CCDROW x NFIBER]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel
Number of bits per data pixel

hdu4.name: WSET
hdu4.description: Wavelength solution traceset in log-10 Angstroms (vacuum)

FUNC.name: FUNC
FUNC.description: describes the function used to fit the wavelength solutions (units of log-10 Angstroms) and Y-positions to a functional form. Chebyshev or Legendre functions are used. Default value is taken as Legendre function.

XMIN.name: XMIN
XMIN.description: minimum value of the independent variable used by fitting function.

XMAX.name: XMAX
XMAX.description: maximum value of the independent variable which is used along with the fitting coefficients, in the fitting function to get the value of dependent variable, which is the wavelength solution.

hdu5.name: DISPSET
hdu5.description: Broadened dispersion solution (1sigma LSF in pixels) as Legendre polynomials

FUNC.name: FUNC
FUNC.description: describes the function used to fit the line width (units of pixels) and Y-positions to a functional form. Chebyshev or Legendre functions are used. Default value is taken as Legendre function.

XMIN.name: XMIN
XMIN.description: minimum value of the independent variable used by fitting function.

XMAX.name: XMAX
XMAX.description: maximum value of the independent variable which is used along with the fitting coefficients, in the fitting function to get the value of dependent variable, which is the line width of fibers.

hdu6.name: SLITMAP
hdu6.description: Slitmap structure appropriate for the exposure

HOLETYPE.name: HOLETYPE
HOLETYPE.description: Type of hole from plugmap (MANGA or MANGA_SINGLE)

FIBERID.name: FIBERID
FIBERID.description: Number of the fiber along the slithead (should be 1 --> 1423 where 1423 is the total number of fibers, 1-->709 should be on spectrograph 1, 710 --> 1423 should be on spectrograph 2.)

TARGETTYPE.name: TARGETTYPE
TARGETTYPE.description: science, standard, or sky from plateHoles

BLOCKID.name: BLOCKID
BLOCKID.description: ID number of block along the slit (unique across both spectrographs)

HARTYPE.name: HARTYPE
HARTYPE.description: Either SINGLE or MULTIPLE (for the 3-IFU minibundles)

HARBLOCK.name: HARBLOCK
HARBLOCK.description: Block number within a given harness

IFUINBLOCK.name: IFUINBLOCK
IFUINBLOCK.description: IFU number within a v-groove block

BLOCKSIZE.name: BLOCKSIZE
BLOCKSIZE.description: Number of fibers in the block

IFUSIZE.name: IFUSIZE
IFUSIZE.description: Total number of non-sky fibers in the corresponding IFU

IFUDESIGN.name: IFUDESIGN
IFUDESIGN.description: The IFU design (e.g., 12701) that was plugged here according to plateHolesSorted. If plugging was done correctly, this should match with frlPlug according to the table at manga_ferrule_names.par

FRLPLUG.name: FRLPLUG
FRLPLUG.description: The physical ferrule matching this part of the slit, i.e. code taped onto the ferrule for the pluggers to use. (E.g., the thing labelled '23' gets plugged into the hole marked '23'). Values 21-37 are science IFUs, 51-62 are standard star IFUs

HARNAME.name: HARNAME
HARNAME.description: The harness corresponding to frlPlug for this cartridge build. (E.g., ma105)

FINBLOCK.name: FINBLOCK
FINBLOCK.description: Fiber number within the v-groove block (1-blocksize)

FNUM.name: FNUM
FNUM.description: The numbering scheme internal to a given harness. Positive valued for IFU fibers, e.g., fnum=1-127 for a 127-fiber IFU, fnum=1-21 for calibration harnesses. Negative valued for sky fibers (e.g. -1 through -8).

FRLCODE.name: FRLCODE
FRLCODE.description: The code laser etched on the ferrule itself during production

XPMM.name: XPMM
XPMM.description: The x coordinate in mm of the fiber relative to the ferrule centroid (sky-view frame, +x=E,+y=N)

YPMM.name: YPMM
YPMM.description: The y coordinate in mm of the fiber relative to the ferrule centroid (sky-view frame, +x=E,+y=N)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: ra coordinate of hole as generated by the automapper

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: dec coordinate of hole as generated by the automapper

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: xFocal plate coordinate of the hole in mm (+x=E,+y=N)

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: yFocal plate coordinate of the hole in mm (+x=E,+y=N)

MANGA_TARGET1.name: MANGA_TARGET1
MANGA_TARGET1.description: Bitmap identifier of galaxy target catalog

MANGA_TARGET2.name: MANGA_TARGET2
MANGA_TARGET2.description: Bitmap identifier of non-galaxy target catalog

MANGA_TARGET3.name: MANGA_TARGET3
MANGA_TARGET3.description: Bitmap identifier of ancillary target catalog

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: Total flux from PSF model from broadband imaging. Nonzero only for standard stars.

hdu7.description: X position on the CCD [CCDROW x NFIBER]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel

Number of bits per data pixel

hdu4.name: WSET
hdu4.description: Wavelength solution traceset in log-10 Angstroms (vacuum)

FUNC.name: FUNC
FUNC.description: describes the function used to fit the wavelength solutions (units of log-10 Angstroms) and Y-positions to a functional form. Chebyshev or Legendre functions are used. Default value is taken as Legendre function.

XMIN.name: XMIN
XMIN.description: minimum value of the independent variable used by fitting function.

XMAX.name: XMAX
XMAX.description: maximum value of the independent variable which is used along with the fitting coefficients, in the fitting function to get the value of dependent variable, which is the wavelength solution.

hdu5.name: DISPSET
hdu5.description: Broadened dispersion solution (1sigma LSF in pixels) as Legendre polynomials

FUNC.name: FUNC
FUNC.description: describes the function used to fit the line width (units of pixels) and Y-positions to a functional form. Chebyshev or Legendre functions are used. Default value is taken as Legendre function.

XMIN.name: XMIN
XMIN.description: minimum value of the independent variable used by fitting function.

XMAX.name: XMAX
XMAX.description: maximum value of the independent variable which is used along with the fitting coefficients, in the fitting function to get the value of dependent variable, which is the line width of fibers.

hdu6.name: SLITMAP
hdu6.description: Slitmap structure appropriate for the exposure

HOLETYPE.name: HOLETYPE
HOLETYPE.description: Type of hole from plugmap (MANGA or MANGA_SINGLE)

FIBERID.name: FIBERID
FIBERID.description: Number of the fiber along the slithead (should be 1 --> 1423 where 1423 is the total number of fibers, 1-->709 should be on spectrograph 1, 710 --> 1423 should be on spectrograph 2.)

TARGETTYPE.name: TARGETTYPE
TARGETTYPE.description: science, standard, or sky from plateHoles

BLOCKID.name: BLOCKID
BLOCKID.description: ID number of block along the slit (unique across both spectrographs)

HARTYPE.name: HARTYPE
HARTYPE.description: Either SINGLE or MULTIPLE (for the 3-IFU minibundles)

HARBLOCK.name: HARBLOCK
HARBLOCK.description: Block number within a given harness

IFUINBLOCK.name: IFUINBLOCK
IFUINBLOCK.description: IFU number within a v-groove block

BLOCKSIZE.name: BLOCKSIZE
BLOCKSIZE.description: Number of fibers in the block

IFUSIZE.name: IFUSIZE
IFUSIZE.description: Total number of non-sky fibers in the corresponding IFU

IFUDESIGN.name: IFUDESIGN
IFUDESIGN.description: The IFU design (e.g., 12701) that was plugged here according to plateHolesSorted. If plugging was done correctly, this should match with frlPlug according to the table at manga_ferrule_names.par

FRLPLUG.name: FRLPLUG
FRLPLUG.description: The physical ferrule matching this part of the slit, i.e. code taped onto the ferrule for the pluggers to use. (E.g., the thing labelled '23' gets plugged into the hole marked '23'). Values 21-37 are science IFUs, 51-62 are standard star IFUs

HARNAME.name: HARNAME
HARNAME.description: The harness corresponding to frlPlug for this cartridge build. (E.g., ma105)

FINBLOCK.name: FINBLOCK
FINBLOCK.description: Fiber number within the v-groove block (1-blocksize)

FNUM.name: FNUM
FNUM.description: The numbering scheme internal to a given harness. Positive valued for IFU fibers, e.g., fnum=1-127 for a 127-fiber IFU, fnum=1-21 for calibration harnesses. Negative valued for sky fibers (e.g. -1 through -8).

FRLCODE.name: FRLCODE
FRLCODE.description: The code laser etched on the ferrule itself during production

XPMM.name: XPMM
XPMM.description: The x coordinate in mm of the fiber relative to the ferrule centroid (sky-view frame, +x=E,+y=N)

YPMM.name: YPMM
YPMM.description: The y coordinate in mm of the fiber relative to the ferrule centroid (sky-view frame, +x=E,+y=N)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: ra coordinate of hole as generated by the automapper

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: dec coordinate of hole as generated by the automapper

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: xFocal plate coordinate of the hole in mm (+x=E,+y=N)

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: yFocal plate coordinate of the hole in mm (+x=E,+y=N)

MANGA_TARGET1.name: MANGA_TARGET1
MANGA_TARGET1.description: Bitmap identifier of galaxy target catalog

MANGA_TARGET2.name: MANGA_TARGET2
MANGA_TARGET2.description: Bitmap identifier of non-galaxy target catalog

MANGA_TARGET3.name: MANGA_TARGET3
MANGA_TARGET3.description: Bitmap identifier of ancillary target catalog

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: Total flux from PSF model from broadband imaging. Nonzero only for standard stars.

hdu7.name: XPOS
hdu7.description: X position on the CCD [CCDROW x NFIBER]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel

hdu8.name: SUPERFLAT
hdu8.description: Superflat vector from quartz lamps [CCDROW x NFIBER]

header.comment: Number of bits per data pixel
